existing_features.title: Add a Social area in the frontend with navigation entry and routes/pages to manage: Friends (requests + friends list), Messages (inbox/conversations + thread view + compose), Parties (current party + invites), and Following (followed creators list).

Create new React Query hooks for social APIs (friends, messages, parties, following, user search) using the existing actor pattern and query invalidation conventions already used by experiences and profiles.
Add “Follow creator” UI on the Experience Details page for the experience author, reflecting current follow state and follower count when available.

Apply a coherent, consistent visual theme for the new social pages that matches the existing Tailwind/shadcn design system (typography, spacing, card layouts, and icon usage), without introducing new product features beyond the requested social functionality.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add social features: friend requests, private messaging, party system for joining games together, and ability to follow favorite creators
Implement backend social graph features: friend requests (send, accept, decline/cancel), friends list, and friend request inbox/outbox, all scoped to authenticated users and keyed by Principal.
Implement backend private messaging: direct message threads between two Principals with APIs to create/find a conversation, send messages, list conversations, and fetch messages for a conversation.

Implement backend party system: create party, invite users, accept/decline invites, join/leave party, list current party state for the caller, and optionally associate a party with an experienceId to support “joining games together”.
Implement backend creator following: allow authenticated users to follow and unfollow another Principal, list followed creators for the caller, and list follower count for a given creator principal.

Add backend user discovery endpoints needed for social features: list/search user profiles by display name (returning principals + public profile fields) so users can find people to friend/message/follow.
